overview: Do we still believe in love when we are in the autumn of our lives? And how do we love? Through the crossed portraits of septuagenarians, the film questions the love life of seniors today. From André and Marie-France who scour the dating sites in search of a man to their liking to Ginette and Claude, who met in a dance hall and whose Ginette blossoms in her role of housewife always taking care of her man.
title: Le temps d'aimer
